briefTitle: Psychological Interventions to Prevent Late Effects in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Pre- and Post-operative Psychological Interventions to Prevent Pain and Fatigue After Breast Cancer Surgery: a Randomized Controlled Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women diagnosed with breast cancer and scheduled for surgery
* Be able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Insufficient Norwegian speaking or writing skills to participate in the interventions and fill out questionnaires
* Cognitive and psychiatric impairment
* Other serious malignancies
